column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The service was great
column2: our waiter explained everything in detail
column3: had suggestions and answered my questions perfectly.  Our appetizer came out in a decent amount of time which was about 30-35 minuets.  It was a perfect deep dish pizza and served piping hot.  Our waiter served the first pieces of pizza and the. It was up to us to eat this amazing pizza
column4: the cheese was melted perfectly layered with tomato sauce and pepperoni.  The crust was perfect
column5: golden brown with a nice butter taste and could be a meal on its own.  I love pizza and this deep dish was everything I wanted it to be and more.  So worth the wait and the time it too
